product_name: DIMECreamy Foam Cleanser with Glycolic + Salicylic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackCleanse and gently exfoliate your skin with DIME Creamy Foam Cleanser: Glycolic + Salicylic Acid. This clean, lightweight formula sinks deep into pores to eliminate excess oil, debris, and acne-causing bacteria. For all skin types, this cleanser is especially effective for oily or acne-prone skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsDissolves dead skin cells to keep pores cleanHelps accelerate skin cell turnoverKey IngredientsSalicylic Acid: Salicylic acid is a highly effective BHA (Beta Hydroxy Acid) that helps prevents pore clogging and assists in reducing swelling and redness. It is an effective treatment that helps clear blemishes quickly by penetrating pores and removing excess oil and bacteria.Glycolic Acid: Glycolic acid is a powerful AHA (Alpha Hydroxy Acid), a natural component derived from sugar cane, known to improve uneven skin tone. This acid is designed to exfoliate and cleanse clogged pores while refining the skin’s texture and reducing the appearance of blemishes and scarring.Formulated WithoutSulfates: DIME products never contain skin-irritating ingredients such as sulfates. Sulfate-free products are gentle on the skin and can help decrease the chances of an allergic reaction.Phthalates: Certain phthalates (like Dibutyl Phthalate, aka DBP, or DEHP, and DEP) appear on product labels, but most typically remain unlisted, hiding under the term “fragrance.” Since some phthalates have been linked to hormone disruption, DIME avoids them.Item 2616777How To UseDispense 2-3 pumps of cleanser into your hand. Gently rub hands together to bring to a lather. Massage onto a wet face in circular motions for 60 seconds. Rinse with warm water and pat dry. Use as the first step in your skincare routine both morning and night.As a Conscious Beauty brand, DIME features sustainable packaging. Once product is empty, twist off cap, rinse bottle, and toss into recycling bin.IngredientsWater, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Coco Betaine Caprylyl Glycol, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, PCA Ethyl Cocoyl Arginate, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract, Fructooligosaccharides, Glycolic Acid, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Piroctone Olamine, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Bakuchiol, Sodium PCA, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Artemisia Vulgaris Extract, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Zinc PCA, Cinnamomum Cassia Bark Extract, Sanguisorba Officinalis Root Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dispense 2-3 pumps of cleanser into your hand. Gently rub hands together to bring to a lather. Massage onto a wet face in circular motions for 60 seconds. Rinse with warm water and pat dry. Use as the first step in your skincare routine both morning and night.As a Conscious Beauty brand, DIME features sustainable packaging. Once product is empty, twist off cap, rinse bottle, and toss into recycling bin.

reviews.headline: Eh
reviews.comments: You definitely need about 4-5 pumps to get a good amount to cover your whole face. The foam clears up fast so you don't really feel like you're getting a good clense.

reviews.headline: Don't get the hype
reviews.comments: Was really hoping to love this but theres just nothing great about it? Super thin and not foamy on your face at all. Being so thin it didnt feel like it really cleaned my face. No changes to my acne & has an off putting smell, almost chemical like?

faceoff_positive.comments: I'm three weeks into using this cleanser along with the restorative night cream and hyaluronic acid serum. My skin is sooo smooth and free of any and all small to large spots of acne. I was a bit anxious to try this cleanser thinking it would be too harsh for my sensitive skin. It's totally gentle enough to where there is no irritation. Gentle yet very cleansing, it gets it allll out. At first I found myself using more than 2-3 pumps. Now that I know, That's all you need. A little goes a long way. I'm not even half way done with my first bottle and I have already ordered another bottle, along with the TBT cream. Very thankful this cleanser is gentle enough yet powerful in the cleaning department for me. My favorite go to cleanser by Kiehls was discontinued and DIME was recommended by a friend in Toronto. DIME will be the only company I use for skincare for the foreseeable future. I have never had products blow me away upon first impressions like DIME. Bravo yall, bravo.
faceoff_positive.headline: Awesome cleanser!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I really love the actual product - the foam is nice and light and does not dry out my skin, but easily removes my makeup. However, the pump gets stuck in the "down" position every single time I use it. It's so annoying that it will definitely prevent me from purchasing this product again until the packaging is improved. Very unfortunate. Fumbling around with a wet face full running mascara in my eyes while trying to pump the bottle is just not how I like to end my day. Please send out an email/texy blast when the packaging is improved!
faceoff_negative.headline: Love the actual product but the pump is so so bad!

rollup.name: Creamy Foam Cleanser with Glycolic + Salicylic Acid
